item.description:
All members of this group are welcome, whether or not they are Reiki practitioners. But if you have flu or a cold, please wait till you are over it. This is to facilitate healing, so we don't want anyone to catch any "bugs"!

This Meetup is hosted by Donna Chagnon, a Reiki Master in Allenstown.

Address is:

58 Turnpike St.
Allenstown, NH 03275

The Meetup will be from 6 to 8pm. The second hour is reserved for complimentary treatments for the general public, so if you are bringing a friend please indicate the number of guests you will be bringing along.

For further information, look for Donna in the member list. Where you will see an option to contact her by e-mail.

Thank you Donna, for hosting!

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: Free Reiki Share in Allenstown, NH
